name: Clicker Boss (jkgaming)
description:
Clicker boss is a collection of clicker mini-games. There are four games currently. They are -

1.Click Fight

Here some enemies randomly spawn and you have to click on them to kill them. Killing a enemy gives you one point. If the enemy collides with you then you lose health.At times you also have to run away from your enemy. You can move using the arrow keys.

2. Bomb Splash

In Bomb Splash, Bombs keep falling from the sky. If the bombs collide with the ground then you lose health. You can destroy the bombs by clicking on them. The number of bombs increases gradually.

3. Coin Collector

In Coin Collector, there are three spawners from where coins falls. We can collect the coins by clicking on them, which gives us points. There are two enemies who also try to collect the coins. The coins collected by the enemies won't regenerate so if all the coins are taken by the enemies then no more coins will fall from the spawners. You can increase the number of coins falling from the spawners by upgrading them which costs you 4 coins.

4. Tank Wars

In tank wars, you can shoot bullets by clicking anywhere on the screen. Your goal is to kill the enemy who will also shoot bullets at you after he comes close enough. You can move left and right by using the arrow keys.
